description: Detects file creation patterns noticeable during the exploitation of CVE-2021-40444
name: Suspicious Word Cab File Write CVE-2021-40444
query: ((process.executable:*\\winword.exe AND ((file.path:*.cab AND file.path:*\\Windows\\INetCache*) OR (file.path:*\\AppData\\Local\\Temp\\* AND file.path:*.inf*))) AND (NOT (file.path:C\:\\Users\\* AND file.path:*AppData\\Local\\Temp* AND file.path:*\\Content.inf)))
author: Florian Roth
Sittikorn S
